author: Michael McWhertor
description: The PC version will be exclusive to Blizzard’s platform
title: Destiny 2 is coming to Blizzard’s Battle.net

author: Jonathon Dornbush
description: Available physically in stores, Destiny 2 will only be for purchase digitally on PC via Blizzard's service.
title: Destiny 2 PC Version Available Exclusively Through Blizzard's Battle.net - IGN

author: Miranda Sanchez
description: Blizzard is celebrating a year of Overwatch with special events and a new edition of the game.
title: Overwatch Anniversary Event and Game of the Year Edition Announced - IGN
